task.title: How To Find Breakfast Food
task.shortdesc: This task will teach you how to navigate through the apartment, specifically where to find breakfast food materials.

step.cmd: The apartment has two kitchens, you are free to use either one, but the kitchen on the left side facing the front door has more food.
You are welcome to any of the cereal in the shelf, and there is a gallon of milk in the refrigerator.
Bowls are in the top cabinet directly to the right of the stovetop
